title: Ticket #2553: Expose SIGNAL_FAMILY via procd_ctl
description:
In OSG's usage of procd_ctl, we like to send slightly more polite signals to a job family (such as SIGTERM) before we SIGKILL it.

The implementation is currently race-prone, as we do a LIST + for loop of SIGNAL_PROCESS.

This could be solved if SIGNAL_FAMILY was directly exposed via procd_ctl. I'd guess we'd also need a mechanism for querying the procd about what commands it supports.
